LanguageData.MW_MayWorks.label: Week of hard work
LanguageData.MW_MayWorks.letterText:
The leaders of the galactic proletariat have bequeathed to work for the common good. 

Worker Galactic Solidarity Week inspires heroic deeds. 

It was labor that made Norbal a human. 

Throughout the week, the colonists will receive various bonuses for their work, but beware of the lazy ones!
